definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Their Chinese orthographic awareness develops with their growing vocabulary of Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 汉字正字法意识随识字量的增加而发展。

sentences.english: They see the word and there's some kind of an orthographic representation.
sentences.chinese: 当他们看到单词时，某种正字法在脑中呈现。

sentences.english: In writing, words must have formal representation, called orthography .
sentences.chinese: 以书面形式，必须有正式的话代表性，所谓正字法。

sentences.english: There are so many grammatical and orthographic mistakes on it.
sentences.chinese: 有这么多的语法和正字法错误。

sentences.english: The orthography is the written system and spelling of a language.
sentences.chinese: 正字法是指一种语言的书写和拼写系统。

definition: see 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4]
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
